channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - September 25, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-september-25-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Agon_ * _Apocalypse Keys_ * _Brinkwood_ * _Checkpoint Midnight_ * _Coruscant Comrades_ * _Eotenweard_ * _For the Honor!_ * _Karanduun_ * _Labyrinth the Adventure Game_ * _Masks_ * _Plutonian Shore_ * _Sentinel Comics_ * _Surreal Estate_ * _Swords of the Serpentine_ * _Ultraviolet Grasslands_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!

@flatvurm wrote:
